headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Take advantage of 50% off the cost of Bunker Supplies and Mk II Weapon Upgrades to help you get on the right foot. Plus, 40% off the MOC and its Upgrades, Modifications, Weapons and Vehicle Workshops. Players can also take discounts off the retail prices of the following vehicles:

Declasse Weaponized Tampa - 40% off
Karin Technical Custom - 40% off
HVY Nightshark - 40% off
JoBuilt Hauler Custom - 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
